name: fhir_rag
description: Production-ready FastAPI backend service for the FHIR RAG Chatbot, providing intelligent clinical data analysis through hybrid retrieval (SQL + Vector Search).

scripts.install-backend: cd backend && conda activate fhir_rag_env && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.backend-env: conda activate fhir_rag_env && python -m uvicorn backend.app:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
